metadata.title: Example AI Art Prompts
metadata.description: Sample prompts demonstrating the AI Art Generator capabilities
metadata.author: AI Art Generator

prompts.title: Mystical Forest
prompts.description: A magical forest with bioluminescent plants
prompts.prompt: A mystical enchanted forest with glowing blue mushrooms, ethereal mist, ancient oak trees with twisted branches, soft magical lighting filtering through the canopy, bioluminescent flowers scattered on the forest floor, fantasy art style, high detail, atmospheric

prompts.title: Crystal Cave
prompts.description: Underground cave filled with luminous crystals
prompts.prompt: Deep underground crystal cave with massive luminous amethyst and quartz formations, prismatic light reflections, underground pools of clear water, stalactites and stalagmites, magical atmosphere, fantasy setting, detailed textures

prompts.title: Floating Islands
prompts.prompt: Floating islands suspended in a twilight sky, waterfalls cascading into clouds below, ancient ruins on the islands, glowing crystals, dramatic lighting, fantasy landscape, aerial view, epic scale

prompts.title: Wise Sage
prompts.prompt: Portrait of a wise elderly sage with long silver hair and beard, wearing simple robes, kind eyes with ancient wisdom, holding a glowing crystal orb, fantasy character art, detailed facial features, warm lighting

prompts.title: Forest Guardian
prompts.prompt: Forest guardian spirit with bark-like skin, hair made of leaves and vines, glowing green eyes, wearing natural armor of wood and moss, standing pose, fantasy character, nature magic, detailed texture work

prompts.title: Crystal Mage
prompts.prompt: Crystal mage with crystalline staff, robes embedded with gems, blue magical energy emanating from hands, mysterious expression, fantasy character portrait, magical effects, high detail
